body:
Looks pretty good. One more suggestion: Travis has a `script` deploy provider. By using that instead of `after_success` (which is also recommended in the docs), the deploy script won't even both running on PRs, and we can control which branches it runs on.

https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/deployment/script

``` yaml
deploy:
  provider: script
  script: bin/deploy/dockerhub.sh
  on:
    branch: master
```
